char_info.char_desc: The Plant Whose Hair Never Stops Growing

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I've defeated you. So, what's going to happen?

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: So, you planted a bunch of fertilizer on your scalp?

t_scene_info.speaker: Mayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: No, the enchantment is the fertilizer.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I've heard somebody kickstarted this at the Palace of Eternity.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'm guessing it's time to pay a visit to Empress Kaguya...
